text: Ceroplesis calabarica is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Chevrolat in 1858. It is known from Angola, Benin, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Cameroon, Gabon, Equatorial Guinea, Ghana, Mozambique, Nigeria, Kenya, the Republic of the Congo, Uganda, Togo, and Zambia.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis calabarica. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. Its diet includes Coffea arabica and Coffea canephora. ==Varietas== * Ceroplesis calabarica var. congolensis Hintz, 1920 * Ceroplesis calabarica var. immaculata Hintz, 1920 * Ceroplesis calabarica var. mozambica Hintz, 1920 * Ceroplesis calabarica var. transitiva Breuning, 1937 ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1858
title: Ceroplesis calabarica
